Starstomp: Well , Trinity, looks like those guys are our 
reinforcements! Aquataur, Pyrotaur, mind giving me a hand to wipe 
those dragons out? I think we'd be ungrateful to leave our Maximal 
friends there take all the damage!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightlight/Windlord/Termitron/Trinity::
> 
> Nighlight looked to the screen and she wasn't sure what to say or 
do. 
> Trinity arrived to control room, followed by Termitron. The little 
> Chivtron looked to all Chivtrons said "What happened?? are the bad 
> guys there outside???? "
> 
> ***********
> 
> Windlord woke up and left Cr, he felt better and he wanted to know 
> what's going outside and what happened with his fellows Chivtrons. 
He 
> walked towards the control room
